title: "AI can identify hepatocellular carcinoma on liver CT exams"
excerpt: "An artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm was able to identify hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) on liver CT exams with a level of accuracy comparable to radiologists, according to research published August 7 in the British Journal of Cancer."
